name: AuditEvent
title: AuditEvent
description: A record of an event made for purposes of maintaining a security log. Typical uses include detection of intrusion attempts and monitoring for inappropriate usage.

elements.name: AuditEvent
elements.description: A record of an event made for purposes of maintaining a security log.

elements.name: type
elements.description: Identifier for a family of the event. For example, a menu item, program, rule, policy, function code, application name or URL. It identifies the performed function.

elements.name: subtype
elements.description: Identifier for the category of event.

elements.name: action
elements.description: Indicator for type of action performed during the event that generated the audit.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The period during which the activity occurred.

elements.name: recorded
elements.description: The time when the event was recorded.

elements.name: outcome
elements.description: Indicates whether the event succeeded or failed.

elements.name: outcomeDesc
elements.description: A free text description of the outcome of the event.

elements.name: purposeOfEvent
elements.description: The purposeOfUse (reason) that was used during the event being recorded.

elements.name: agent
elements.description: An actor taking an active role in the event or activity that is logged.

elements.name: source
elements.description: The system that is reporting the event.

elements.name: entity
elements.description: Specific instances of data or objects that have been accessed.
